lead_paragraph: The organization says it will change how it assesses a charity’s financial health to provide a better picture over time.

headline.print_headline: Charity Navigator Tweaks Its Rating System
headline.main: Charity Navigator Tweaks Its Rating System

snippet: The organization says it will change how it assesses a charity’s financial health to provide a better picture over time.
abstract: Ann Carrns Your Money Adviser column says popular charity-rating website Charity Navigator is changing way it rates nonprofit groups; Q&A about charity assessments given.
